title: Cosmic Enchantress Lulu - What is her 'W'
body: What is her 'W' supposed to be. The only thing I've been able to think of is a space octopus. {{champion:117}}

replies.body: Ok I can kinda see it now. It's "abstract".

Ah actually I misread. I'd thought you were referencing Pix and Lulu's E, not her polymorph (W).
Lulu's polymorph is consistent across all skins in that it turns champions into something cute or goofy. So I'd say space octopus is probably a good description for it :P
Though thinking of a space octopus as an abstract aurelion smol is kinda funny, really knocks the mighty space dragon down a peg.
